title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1903.5 - Notification
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1903.5 - Notification

State Regulations

The corporation shall notify each applicant of an award
of a payment, grant or loan and the terms and conditions thereof, or the
rejection of the application. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9
ยง
1903.5

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
